com.daw.pms.Service.PMS

Interface SongService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SongServiceImpl

    public interface SongService
    Service for songs in pms.
    Since:
    6/3/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result getDetailSong(String ids, Integer platform)
      Get the detail information of the song.
      BasicLyrics getLyrics(Long id, Integer platform)
      Get the lyrics of the song with id.
      List<? extends BasicSong> getSimilarSongs(String songId, Integer songType, Integer platform)
      Return a list of similar song with songId.

    • Method Detail

      • getDetailSong

        Result getDetailSong(String ids,
                     Integer platform)
        Get the detail information of the song.
        Parameters:
        ids - The song mid.
        platform - The platform this song belongs to.
        Returns:
        Detail song, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is subclass of BasicSong.

      • getSimilarSongs

        List<? extends BasicSong> getSimilarSongs(String songId,
                                          Integer songType,
                                          Integer platform)
        Return a list of similar song with songId.
        Parameters:
        songId - The song id.
        songType - The pms song type, only used in pms platform.
        platform - The platform the song belongs to.
        Returns:
        A list of similar songs with songId.

      • getLyrics

        BasicLyrics getLyrics(Long id,
                      Integer platform)
        Get the lyrics of the song with id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of song.
        platform - The platform this song belongs to.
        Returns:
        Lyrics of your song in netease cloud music.

      • getSongsLink

        Result getSongsLink(String ids,
                    String level,
                    Integer platform)
        Get the songs' links.
        Parameters:
        ids - The song's id, multiple songs id separated with comma, in bilibili, ids == bvid:cid.
        level - Quality of song, include standard, higher, exhigh, lossless, hires, jyeffect, sky, jymaster.
        platform - The platform id.
        Returns:
        The urls of your songs with ids ids, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is Map<String,String> (qqmusic and ncm platform) or BiliLinksDTO (bilibili platform), single song link in pms platform.

      • searchResourcesByKeyword

        Result searchResourcesByKeyword(String keyword,
                                Integer pageNo,
                                Integer pageSize,
                                Integer type,
                                Integer platform)
        Search resources of type type by keyword.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword to search.
        pageNo - The page number.
        pageSize - The page size.
        type - The type of the searched resources.
        platform - The platform id.
        Returns:
        Searched resources wrapped by Result DTO, the data is PagedDataDTO<T>.
